• • • • •
We teased you yesterday, but no more monkeying around…here’s the recipe for Monkey Punch!

This tasty cocktail recipe has been created by Erik Lorincz from Kwānt, No.47 in The World’s 50 Best Bars 2019, with Monkey Shoulder whisky. Will you be giving it a try?

𝐈𝐧𝐠𝐫𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬
25ml Monkey Shoulder
25ml Calvados
10ml Mezcal
10ml oloroso sherry
50ml oat milk
5g zatar
15g demerara sugar 
Garnished with floregano •
Video by @50bestbars
#tw50bc #theworlds50bestcocktails
#Worlds50BestBars #50BestBars #Cocktail #Bar #London #Recipe #CocktailRecipe #Bartender #UK #whisky @monkeyshoulder @kwantlondon @eriklorincz

node.text:
𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @cheerstohappyhour 

(Recipe Included) - I posted a New York Sour recently that got a ton of love and I got curious what other drinks could use a Red Wine Float. If you love a NY Sour, here’s another concoction that should be on your list.
.
I used Supasawa instead of lemon Juice for a smooth finish and Orgeat to get a delightful nuttiness. The Orgeat I use might be a bit sweeter than yours so test the cocktail for acidity with a straw before adding the wine and just stir in another quarter oz if need be. I used a dry Spanish wine in this drink which worked soooo nicely!
.
I got the crabby cocktail pick from @joannabuchananofficial
.
Drink: Kingston Sour
2 oz Jamaican White Rum
0.75 oz Supasawa
0.5 oz Rich Orgeat
1 oz Red Wine
.
(Method)
Stir all ingredients less the Red Wine. Strain into a rocks or highball glass with ice. Layer on the Red Wine using a barspoon. Present and then combine the wine using barspoon. Garnish: Cherry

𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @thecocktail.blog 

⚱️
The Cascara, or shell (pulp) that surrounds the Coffee Bean itself - usually discarded but being juicy and full of vitamins and caffeine it seems just natural to use this vital part of the coffee fruit
⚱️
And so did my good friends from @erlkoenigcascara also think - now enabling me to share the Love of Cascara with YOU
⚱️
Today you have a wonderful chance of winning the following;
🔮
2 bottles of Cascara Coffee Syrup
1 bag of Cascara
1 bag of Le Pedaleur Power Beans from World Champion Chocolatier Fabian Rimann
🔮
Got your Coffee Attention now?
It sure had mine
⚱️
I celebrated in the only way I know, with a most delightful Coffee Treatment;
⚱️
POWER OF CASCARA
⚱️
4.5 cl Rum Maestro Seleccion
1.5 cl Green Chartreuse
1 cl Cherry Coffee Syrup (@erlkoenigcascara )
2 Dashes Chocolate Bitters
Stir with much Love & Ice
Pour into glass over a large rock of Ice 🧊
Serve on a bed of Coffee Power Beans
Enjoy
Skål 🥂
⚱️
All you need to do is;
📯
1. Follow @erlkoenigcascara
2. Follow me if you want
3. Tell me who you would like to show off your new treats to - if you feel like it
📯
Do share the love if you feel like it - but only then
📯
The Winner will be randomly drawn
⚱️
🌏WORLDWIDE🌍 You must be of legal drinking age in your country and be able to document it. Please note: This giveaway is by no means administrated or sponsored by Instagram
⚱️
Find this, and many more, Classic and New Classics, on my website www.thecocktailblog.dk
⚱️

node.text:
𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @sideshowpete_ 

Hey world-class bartenders, time to update your recipe book! Because we are adding ube to the mix. Ube, or sweet purple yam, is popular for making desserts all over the world! 🌏 But you can get it in powders and extract online. Ube's flavor can be described as vanilla meets pistachio, yum! Plus the pudding we use for the recipe has dairy for a creamy flavor. Mix up one of these and it will definitely be one that is talked about well after happy hour! ⠀
.⠀
If using powdered ube, follow instructions on the back to a pudding-like consistency. Then add ube pudding, vodka, simple and shake with ice. If you are using fresh ube yams, then you will need to make ube pudding for the mix, from scratch. Don't worry the recipe is easy to find online. 👍😅 ⠀
.⠀
💜🍸🍠Ube Martini🍠🍸💜⠀
2 oz Vodka⠀
2 oz Ube Pudding
0.5 oz Simple Syrup⠀
garnish with small toasted marshmallows  
- - - - -

node.text:
𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @servedbysoberon 

Diffords Top 100: TRINIDAD SOUR (60/100)
- 45ml/1.5oz Angostura Aromatic Bitters
- 15ml/0.5oz Rye Whiskey
- 30ml/1oz Orgeat
- 22,5ml/0.75oz Lemon Juice
- - - - -
HOW: Shake with ice / Fine strain in coupe / Ungarnished.
- - -
RATING: 5/5
- - - - -
The Trinidad Sour was invented by New York bartender Giuseppe González at the Clover Club in Brooklyn in 2009 🗽 inspired by the 'Trinidad Especial', which was invented by Italian bartender Valentino Bolognese in 2008.🇮🇹 For his variation, Giuseppe switched the Pisco used in the Especial, to Rye Whiskey for his Sour 🥃.
.
And with this drink, 40 cocktails down in the Top 100, I've awarded my first perfect score of 5/5!🌟 Look, before y'all massively start making it, understand that this drink is an acquired taste.😅 It's not for the faint of heart. It's not for those who want an 'easy drink', an effervescent refresher or a gentle nightcap.🤭 The Trinidad Sour is brutal, like a sledgehammer for the palate 👅.
.
But as much as it 'hurts', it soothes. Its mouthfeel is silken, its finish is beautiful and its flavor evolution is fantastic.💕 The first time anyone comes across the recipe they think can't believe any drink should contain '45ml/1.5oz Angostura Bitters' 🤔. But once you try it, you'll realize how fantastic it is.
.
Drinkstagram ❤️ this is 'Beauty and the Beast' in a single drink, and is mesmerizing as the story.
- - - - -

SMOKED DATES⁠ 

40ml  Bourbon⁠
40ml Graham’s Port 10 Years Old⁠
15ml Dates Syrup⁠
dash Angostura Bitter⁠
dash Lime Juice⁠ 

Recipe © - @justshakeorstir⁠
Photography © - @georgippetrov⁠ 

Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Spey Whisky Glass @urbanbaruk over 1 large ice block. Add smoke for instant infuse with a smoking gun. This cocktail was smoked with Bourbon Soaked Oak Wood Chips. Garnish with Physalis berry & dry dates.⁠
.

node.text:
𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @sideshowpete_ 

Contrast can create excitement and few drinks are as bold as this. With lime coming in the nearly clear and deep red of pomegranate this cocktail is visually enticing. Once your mouth gets there, you will be sold. This is the Pom Thumb. A sipper with gin, lime juice, simple, and a bit of pomegranate juice floated on top. A drink you are sure to love.⠀
.⠀
👍🍹Pom Thumb🌿🍹⠀
2 oz gin⠀
1 oz lime juice⠀
1 oz simple syrup⠀
1 oz Pomegranate Juice⠀
.⠀
Mix gin, lime juice, and simple syrup into a shaker with ice. Shake well to chill and strain over fresh ice. Float the pomegranate juice on top, garnish and serve. ⠀
.⠀
Through April 30,2020, Sideshow Pete has committed 100% of ALL PROFITS to the US Bartenders Guild. Check out the link in our Bio. Buy the book 101 Ways to Amuse/Abuse a Bar-Fly (shipped directly to your door) or download from Amazon, Cocktails: Classics to Complex. Help us help the industry people that are out of work. Another way to help, donate directly to the USBG.⠀
.⠀
Stay in, stay healthy, stay positive!

node.text:
𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @servedbysoberon 

MIST OVER JALISCO
- 45ml/1.5oz Reposado Tequila
- 15ml/0.5oz Mezcal Espadin
- 10ml/0.33oz Campari
- 10ml/0.33oz Cointreau
- 22,5ml/0.75oz Lime Juice
- 15ml/0.75oz Passionfruit Syrup
- 2 mists of Absinthe
- - - - -
HOW: Mist your glass with Absinthe once / Shake all other ingredients with crushed ice / Dirty dump / Top with more ice / Mist Absinthe a second time / Garnish.
- - - - -
The past years, due to the success of The Mandalorian, it has been Grogu/Baby Yoda who was getting all the love 💕 but what about the OG Yoda? Let's not forget him, shall we?🤭 So here's him standing in half a Passionfruit. Not that it has much to do with the cocktail... 🤪 but oh well 🤷‍♂️!
.
In the glass you get some kind of 'Passionfruit Margarita' that's enhanced with a splash of Mezcal and Campari for good measure.🍹 But what really stands out is that the entire drink is embraced by a fine veil of Absinthe.🧚‍♂️ By first misting the inside of the glass and then the top of the drink, it hints of it at all times, yet without it ever being the dominant flavor.🔥 Ah, the wonderful world of balance ☺️.
.
Drinkstagram ❤️ here's to lovely complex sips, with or without lightsaber-wielding Jedi Masters on top (but who would ditch poor Yoda, right? 😜)
- - - - -
